entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
